name: pastel
content:
pastel noun
(MATERIAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a soft, coloured substance, usually in the form of a small stick, that is used to draw pictures, or a picture made using this: Do you like working in pastel? The show includes 85 paintings, pastels, and sculptures.
iSailorr/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

(of colors) pale and soft
pastel noun [C]
(COLORED STICK)
a soft, powdery, coloring material that is pressed into a stick and is used for drawing, or a picture made using these sticks
